true.say: I’ve been told that someone matching your description may have acquired a certain Tsarina’s slippers.
true.page: What? I have no idea what you’re talking about!
true.say: Come on now, I’m not like the others here. You can be honest with me.
true.page: You do seem a little different...
Just don’t tell anyone else it was me, okay?
I’m just a poor blacksmith from a nearby village.
I snuck in to this party because I needed to fetch the Tsarina’s leather slippers in order to prove my love to a girl in my village.
I would have left by now, but it looks like it's going to start snowing and I don’t want to get caught out there in the middle of it.
Please understand, I only did it for love.

option.say: There are other ways, return the slippers and I won’t tell anyone.
option.page: You know, I think you’re right. Please forgive me, I’ll just try to win her heart by being myself then!
I’ll put these back in the closet where I found them.

option.say: I understand, but you might want to leave the next chance you get before you get caught.
option.page: Oh thank you, I’m sure to win over my beloved now!
